name: Smart Shiba
description: "Smart Shiba is not just a token but something way bigger, with a goal to become one of the most established communities in the BSC network! Determined to bring a change to the BSC space by being a smart transparent token which protects our investor from scams or rugs. It’s smarter to invest in a coin that has actual goals, values with a transparent team and long-term locked liquidity rather than investing on a lot of other coins with no ambition or big goals where the developers are there to make some quick money with little respect for your time and investments. Smart Shiba combines everyone’s favourite Meme-Coin with the lucrative development of a staking pool for our investors in order for them to lock up their funds and get Smart Shiba tokens in return. The team is also planning to have a P2E game and NFTs"
